metadata.synopsis: At Ramazith's Tower, if players interact with a level hidden in a book, a bookshelve will move in a different place of the tower, but a sound will be played.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Make click on S_LOW_RamazithTower_BookLever_d6014815-37b3-45f5-896d-d17cedb0a079 after succeeding in a perception roll.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: What was that? Something's shifted - somewhere in this tower.
